name: Warm The King
description:
In this Game you need to collet wood to keep the king's Fire feed 

use the bird to chop wood and bring it in to fire 

to select a bird click on it and the n click on the place you want it to work in 

there are 4 jobs for the birds to do: 

1. Oltar: Assigning birds to the oltar will make the bird collect wood from the forest and bring it to the Other

2. Forest: Birds that are assigned to the Forest will begging to chop wood

3. Mine: Birds that are assigned to the Mine will begging to mine stone

4. Smalter: Birds that are assigned to the Smalter will begging to build Axes

Axe will enable the bird to chop 2 wood at one time

to make an axe you need at lest 1 wood and 2 stone in your inventory
